title: Fruity yoghurt jellies
description: These little yoghurt jellies are sweetened with no-added-sugar cordial and will hit the spot if you are used to finishing a meal with dessert. The yoghurt brings extra protein and the jellies are topped with mixed berries for fibre. Leaf gelatine is very simple to use and easily available – so give it a go.With a GI of 39 this meal is high protein, low GI and provides 42 kcal per portion.
ingredients: 6 tbsp sugar-free lemon or orange squash
½ lemon, zest only, finely grated
200g/7oz mixed fresh berries (alternatively use frozen berries)
